test_steps.description: Open the main page of Selenium web to start the test.
test_steps.expected_result: The main page should load successfully.

test_steps.action: Click on the first list item
test_steps.description: Navigate to the iframe section by clicking the first item in the list.
test_steps.expected_result: The iframe page should be displayed.

test_steps.description: Access the xhtmlTest page from the iframe section.
test_steps.expected_result: The xhtmlTest page should load successfully.

test_steps.description: Open the iframe page in the same window.
test_steps.expected_result: The iframe page should be displayed.

test_steps.description: Enter email and age in the respective fields and submit the form.
test_steps.expected_result: A success message should be displayed after form submission.

test_steps.description: Check that the success message is displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Open a new tab and navigate to the base URL
test_steps.description: Create a new tab and go back to the main page of Selenium web.
test_steps.expected_result: The main page should load successfully in the new tab.

test_steps.description: Navigate to the alerts page from the main page.
test_steps.expected_result: The alerts page should load successfully.

test_steps.description: Check that the alerts page URL and header are correct.
test_steps.expected_result: The URL should be correct and the header should read 'Testing Alerts and Stuff'.

test_steps.description: Trigger the alert by clicking 'Let's make the prompt happen' and accept it.
test_steps.expected_result: The alert should be triggered, and the prompt should be accepted successfully.

test_steps.description: Trigger the confirm alert by clicking 'This is a test of a confirm: test confirm' and accept it.
test_steps.expected_result: The confirm alert should be triggered and accepted successfully.

test_steps.action: Verify the visibility of the success message
test_steps.description: Check that the paragraph element containing 'and also' is visible in the page.
test_steps.expected_result:
The paragraph

and also

should be visible on the page.

test_steps.action: Return to the testing alerts page
test_steps.description: Navigate back to the testing alerts page from the current tab.
test_steps.expected_result: The testing alerts page should load successfully.

test_steps.action: Interact with the alert that opens a new window
test_steps.description: Click 'This is a test of an alert open from onclose event handler: open new window' to open a new window.
test_steps.expected_result: A new window should open successfully.

test_steps.description: Check that the new page opened in the window has the correct URL.
test_steps.expected_result: The URL of the new page should be 'https://www.selenium.dev/selenium/web/blank.html'.
